step_feedback.feedback: Good job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your wrists a little closer to your body for better form.
Excellent control in this step! Your shoulder blade movement is smooth and controlled. Keep up the great work.
You're doing well with the repetitions. Focus on maintaining a consistent circular motion and try to keep your wrists from drifting too far away.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to keep your wrists closer to your body for better control.
